interface.name: ListDataListener
interface.javadoc: Sent after the indices in the index0,index1 interval have been inserted in the data model. The new interval includes both index0 and index1. e a ListDataEvent encapsulating the event information
Sent after the indices in the index0,index1 interval have been removed from the data model. The interval includes both index0 and index1. e a ListDataEvent encapsulating the event information

Sent when the contents of the list has changed in a way that's too complex to characterize with the previous methods. For example, this is sent when an item has been replaced. Index0 and index1 bracket the change. e a ListDataEvent encapsulating the event information
